website_summaries.verdict: This translucent pink tent isn't limited to fairy princesses; anyone can enjoy the relaxing lighting that comes with it. It’s a vehicle for imagination that allows children to escape reality and delve into creativity.
pros: Tent comes with carrying case and is simple to set up
cons: Pink can be a color associated with girls, which may prevent boys from wanting to play in it

customer_reviews.title: Pink tent with lights
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. My baby was super happy when she woke up to see it Christmas morning. Exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: It breaks far too easily.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 3 and this tent has broke already I’m three spots and is sitting lopsided. Spend the extra money and get something stronger.
customer_reviews.author: sodapop m genier

customer_reviews.title: Great tent, but not a ball pit
customer_reviews.text: This princess tent is adorable, big, and seems like good quality. The only complaints I have is that the instructions to put it together are pretty difficult to follow. Ended up just figuring it out without the instructions. My biggest complaint though is that from the picture, it looks like it could be a little ball pit, but there is nothing that would hold balls inside of it. But overall, I like it. There's lots of room inside it, and my son absolutely loves it. AND I didn't expect it to come with lights but it did! And the plug into the wall or take batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Niki Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Chintzy Tent
customer_reviews.text: Got this product for my child for Christmas. It was ok until it snapped. My little girl would occasionally get inside and didn't at any point mistreat the tent. Less than regular use, in fact. Disappointed and tired of cheaply made toys that break from less than regular use. Also, doubt is the company will make this right, it was Christmas, but would appreciate a product that last longer than 8 months. Would update review.
customer_reviews.author: Mom Wootz

customer_reviews.title: Cute tent, instructions need work
customer_reviews.text: This tent is really cute - the lights give it a nice extra special touch. But I could only give 4 stars because it is totally stress producing to put together. The issue is that the parts aren't marked so you are guessing. The directions show pics to follow, but there isnt enough descriptive info. I would recommend the purchase because my girls love it and it is super cute. Just wish it wasnt easier to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: MommaMia

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty boosts imagination promotes creativity.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good quality, the shape is what makes it as sturdy as it is. DO NOT loose any peices there are two extra ones but that's it. Hardest thing to put together is the lights still trying to figure them out. Has a USB or batteries. My two year old triplets are stoked. The stars can be dangerous though need adult supervision at all times they can get wrapped up in them and choke or hang themselves. You don't have to use the stars.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Sticht

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice and spacious indoor tent. I am pleased with my purchase and my little one was ecstatic when she received it. The starlights gives it a real camp-out effect. Easily fits 2-3 small children at a time with no overcrowding. This surprise has led to hours fun and she has even made this her go-to reading nook.
customer_reviews.author: Savvy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: My four-year-old niece loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my four-year-old nieces birthday present. I wasn't there when she opened it but I got a very enthusiastic thank you video. And my mother told me that she was so excited and really loved it. So much so that she wanted grandma to have a sleep over party in the tent with her. The tent is too small for a full grown person but I feel it was a successful gift.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made and a pain to put together but overall, really cool
customer_reviews.text: For starters, it did NOT come with instructions, so it took an eternity and a lot of trial and error to get it put together correctly. All it came with was a picture. The lights are really cheap and fall apart easily. Doesn't come with a plug, just a USB and the option to use batteries. Doesn't hold together great and not terribly sturdy. But I will say this: it was probably my daughter's favorite Christmas gift and she absolutely loves it, and it looks pretty awesome once you finally get it together.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Great for current price
customer_reviews.text: Overall well enough product for current price (under $35). The fabric does seem easy to rip and one of the rods bent easy on me (I’m 110lbs) when trying to fit them together because the pieces aren’t all fitted correctly-some are really tight and hard to push in their accurate places. The instructions are a little hilarious but the concept of these tents make assembly easy. The light works and are well enough quality. I got this for two sisters ages 3 & 6 who never get to rowdy so I feel this will last them while they can stand up in it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wood

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to put together but very cute!
customer_reviews.text: A lot of parts, directions didn’t help, they actually complicated things. Our 3 yr old daughter loves it! Spacious and holds all her play things from tea parties to baby dolls she loves her “castle”. Not bad for the price. I bought a fuzzy pink hexagon rug to go with because the tent is all that’s is on the bottom. Lights just lay on top or you can string on the inside. I even go in to play with her.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: One of the worst products I've purchased on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I know you get what you pay for. This has an "attractive" price and is "Amazon's choice". Let me list the pros and Cons Cons - I'm not the greatest handyman. But I've assembled a considerable number of furniture. This was a nightmare to assemble with very unclear markings on the parts - Cloth is very cheap. Few parts tore during assembly - The plastic tubes are also very cheap. Couple of them cracked when my kids were playing in it - I still haven't figured out a way to put the cloth part of the tent up without twisting it and curling it. It's just not intuitive Pros - Pricing. That's all
customer_reviews.author: Suhas Kashyap

customer_reviews.title: Very cute once put together .
customer_reviews.text: The Princess tent is very cute once we were able to put it together. The instructions were very poor and must have been translated into English but someone who speaks Chinese. After a frustrating hour or so, we got it up and added the lights and it is very cute. Our 2 year old granddaughter likes to play in it. I am not sorry we bought it even though we had a hard time assembling the tent. It is just like it shows in the photos with handing lighted stars and flowy sides and looks very princessy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane J. Destefano

customer_reviews.title: Meh pretty but hard to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for my daughter and one for my fiancé’s daughter and they both loved it. I was worried it would be small but my 6 year old who is very tall fits in it perfect with room to spare. Assembly is horrible. Nothing is labeled and the instructions are vague. I have been camping my whole life and have assembled a million tents with no instructions and this was challenging. I cant imagine someone reading the instructions and assembling it correctly with no experience building tents. Other then that its really cute and the kids both loved it. The lights work and they happy overall
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and roomy. My daughter absolutely loves it. Was very Ikea-ish to put together, but worse since there's less pictures. Took a hot minute but it stands well and looks great
customer_reviews.author: Fallen Shi

customer_reviews.title: Easier to assemble than it looks
customer_reviews.text: At first when we received the package, it looked like a lot of work and I was thinking of returning it. Luckily my son said it was easy and he put it up in a short time. My granddaughter loves the tent. It is more spacious than her old one. I also got a carpet to go with it. So I got the princess tent for a good price as lightening deal, but the carpet costs almost as much as the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Objectively

customer_reviews.title: plastic pieces are easily breakable
customer_reviews.text: in the process of putting this together, the very top piece that starts the frame for the whole set up broke off one of it's pieces. We've had it 5 days and can't even put it up because you can't glue anything together. I tried to go back and look to see if i could order a replacement but have not found anything. my daughter is very disappointed it's not up. we also bought a second one and gifted it to someone and can't even use ours.
customer_reviews.author: beverly holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great little tent
customer_reviews.text: Great little princess tent. Was fairly easy to assemble once you get the hang of it. Who ever wrapped the stars though let’s just say they were a tangled mess!! You really have to string them though to make Them perfect so extra cords aren’t hanging down. The small rug we got that was an add on is a little to big by one inch or two. Other then that it works very well. All in all it’s a great little tent. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole green

customer_reviews.title: Poor Instructions, difficult assembly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this gift for my grandchildren. The instructions for assembly were difficult, nothing was labeled. We had to get a tape measure and covert cm to inches to make sure we were using the right sized plastic tubes to connect them correctly. At some points during assembly I had to crawl inside the tent to finish putting it together. Now I am afraid to take it apart, It's going to be a pain to reassemble.
customer_reviews.author: tanya

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set. We love it. See details
customer_reviews.text: We love it. Looks beautiful. Easily for 2-3 kids inside. We specifically bought this because of the open design it should last long. We had two different models earlier with closed design that gets damaged when kids enter and leave. Not a problem with this set. The posts can be a little more studier. But generally should works if the kids don’t jostle the set up around too much.
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Difficult set up
customer_reviews.text: This tent is pretty awesome but the set up is NOT!! The product was made in Korea so I guess to be expected? The lights were all tangled up and the instructions were basic. Parts weren’t labeled on the pieces themselves and instructions were minimal. “Insert f into b” but again only photos, not labels! It took over an hour to set up with multiple trials. Otherwise the product is sturdy and fun. My 5 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: The tent itself is easy to put together but the lights were my biggest issue. I had to use my own ribbon to tie them to the inside poles. Not sure where they are supposed to go on the outside. Also, the battery pack is heavy and awkward, there’s a random usb cord attached to it. But After I tied the lights in the inside it came out cute. The tent itself is pretty big and adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Amara atiyeh

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Don’t remember how much it cost but it’s sturdy . If your child is clumsy like mine and bumps into stuff all the time YES this thing is easy to destroy if the will is there . Used up what little spare parts it came with and some parts are missing but it is standing as shown above . Other kids seeem to love coming to my house and seeing this . Also the light it came with are cheap . They worked for a bit and just never turned back on. Nonetheless I still like this thing very much for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Beware plastic breaks easily!
customer_reviews.text: It is so pretty set up. All our grandchildren have enjoyed it. BUT the plastic pieces break so easily! We have duck taped them, tried to rotate them. Everything, such a big disappointment! The fabric has held up well, some of the plastic broke off a few stars. The kids are not rough with this castle. It is a privilege to use it and they treat it accordingly. Yet when moving inside the pressure on the plastic rods break easily. If you want this for long term or even a party beware!
customer_reviews.author: G-Ma

customer_reviews.title: Children love it.
customer_reviews.text: You can do it in a really quick time to install the product. And everything is made of plastic, so it's light. Children do not have to be hurt. However, if you are unfortunate, the plastic is so thin that there are many broken parts. Even if the children play and break, the plastic support will break. It is a good product if used with careful.
customer_reviews.author: Chanyang Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great play tent!
customer_reviews.text: This play tent is perfect for my granddaughters ages one and four. They sit in playing it for hours. It is a bit tricky to put together and does not come down easily. It is on the larger size so if you don’t have the room for this to stay up then it is not for you. I just keep mine up all the time. The lights are also a nice touch they stay on or can twinkle.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: This is worth every penny. Super easy instruction, lights are perfect and they come with a usb and battery option for power which is great that I don’t have to go through batteries forever but I can still take it outside if I wanted. It’s big enough for me and my doughter to fit inside and she loves it. ONLY DOWNSIDE: We have cats and the mesh curtains are cat attractions to the extreme. So all in all great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew L.

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR.
customer_reviews.text: So, this fabric is really cheap feeling. However, considering the price, I understand why. It took me about an hour to assemble. Once it was assembled I plugged in the lights and 2 of the stars were dead, including the accompanying strand of lights. My girls love it but you will need to put a thick blanket or towel down inside because the fabric will really easily tear. The strand of lights are powered by USB so you will need to supply the box part to plug into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: This is really cute. My 7 year old absolutely loves it. To give you an idea of how huge it is, she can put her Pottery Barn chair inside and still have a ton of room. The highest point is tall, she’s even able to stand straight Up. The lights are a cute addition too! Assembly was a little tricky, but overall this was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble!!
customer_reviews.text: My entire family of 5 tried helping out to assemble. I'm not a quitter so I was adamant about getting the tent put up for my 10 year old. OMG! Idk what kind of instructions these are. A piece of paper that is poorly written in English. The pieces don't match up. After several hours, I gave up. Good luck to anyone who buys and is able to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dana McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Great but doesn’t survive toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: Value for money! Daughter loved it. Cute. The star lights are a PITA to put together; and the instructions are appalling since they are translated by Google from Korean. EDIT: The “updated strong rods” and plastic fittings are trash. About 4 snapped in the middle making them useless and the tent sags because of the missing pieces. Simple fix to ensure tent survives more than one setup and breakdown.
customer_reviews.author: Vincencus

customer_reviews.title: Princess Remote Palace
customer_reviews.text: Cute little setup for the price princess! HOWEVER, the whole draw is the lights. IF you can get them untangled, which is quite the task since it’s multiple layers of chords all joined at different sections of other cord layers... We gave up and decided to purchase other lights that came PROFESSIONALLY packaged.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the money
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, easy to put together but the instructions were not great... but I managed to figure it out. The frame seems pretty flimsy but once you put the canvas over the frame and tie it definitely makes it more stable. My daughter loves it! She loves the lights! I’d definitely buy it again... great product for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley  Vidal

customer_reviews.title: Large tent
customer_reviews.text: Great tent that my granddaughters, ages 2 &4, love. Large enough for them & a couple of friends with room to spare. My only concern is the lights. They dangle & it would be too easy to get tangled in them. We took them out and may put them back up when there is constant adult supervision or when the younger child is older. My daughter-in-law assembled it fairly easily, but she is good at that. Some instructions, and words on the packaging, were in poorly translated English, so it took a little figuring out.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda T

customer_reviews.title: Needs safety adjustments.
customer_reviews.text: Really wanted to love this tent. It’s cute but Very flimsy, for being so large and bulky. Expect poles to break, we broke three trying to put it together. Also not all poles are equally sized. Have duct tape handy. Lights don’t stay on. We just took them off. After two weeks daughter( 18months) and tent fell over when she tried using it to steady herself and one of the poles broke and poked/ cut her leg. We Didn’t want to use it after that.
customer_reviews.author: S. Camarena Di Paola

customer_reviews.title: It’s Bigger than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for Grammie’s little princess! READ The Dimensions before Buying though. It’s WAY BIGGER THAN IT LOOKS! Thank goodness My Daughter has the extra space. So it’s Perfect!! Love the fact that you can plug the lights in OR Just use Batteries. Only took about 1520 minutes to assemble! My Daughter & Granddaughter Even Slleep in it!
customer_reviews.author: S.R.

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: make sure to keep the poles in the bundles. all tallest go together for sides- next tallest for roof- then bottom and top frame are all the same- it took me a couple of tries to figure that out ha ha- so make it simple. It is very cute- she is 7 and in it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Cricket

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Tent with lights is absolutely adorable. However, within 48 hours, several of the plastic rods are broken. It's useless if it has no supporting structure.
customer_reviews.author: GJDiggins

customer_reviews.title: Not so easy to assemble and doesn't last too long...
customer_reviews.text: We got this as a gift for my niece. Delivery was quick but, instruction to assemble wasn't so clear. So, it took a long time to assemble. After all the hard work it looks very nice but, it's not so strong. Attachments detaches so easily. Not so happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Zack and Zill

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money but terrible insteuctions
customer_reviews.text: Overall my kid loves it, so for the money it's worth it. However, the assembly and instructions were terrible. It's made in China and it's obvious by the instructions. Nothing makes sense. You basically have to kind of figure it out on your own by looking at some of the pics. Think of putting together a tent without instructions and with about 30 rods and that's what its like. Getting the lights untangled with how they send it is a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler T

customer_reviews.title: Over all happy!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute! Was a little confusing to put together, directions weren’t much help. But now that it is up I’m in love with it! I do wish the star lights had tie downs but you basically just lay them on top and hope they don’t fall down. But overall happy!
customer_reviews.author: Camilla Swenson's

customer_reviews.title: Lovely product, puts together like IKEA furniture.
customer_reviews.text: First off I loved this product once you get past the instructions and assembly. The poles are not labeled despite the instructions telling you they are. The lights have no where to hang from so I used the silver (Bread Tie) to hold the two ends together and that worked. And after several guessing attempts and a few heavy breaths and talking myself out of sending it back and getting a refund my twin sister and I managed to finally put it together. So as long as you have patience and the stubbornness of a mule, you will love this product too.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Marrow

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsy. Bought for a 3 and 5 yr old. They are gentle enough with it. A bit frustrating to assemble since instructions were not in english. The part that was was incomplete. Overall kids Love it though. Comes with a set of lights. Great value
customer_reviews.author: megan

customer_reviews.title: A ba-zillion pieces to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I disliked that it came with (what seemed to me) a ba-zillon little plastic assembly pieces. I would never want to give this type of presents to a little girl, whose parents would be stuck putting it together. I never opened the clear plastic bag it came in. Returning it soon.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary Degowin

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had it up for a week and the lights already do not work. My daughters are pretty upset. I only bought this because of the cute star lights.
customer_reviews.author: Carli Doering

customer_reviews.title: 3 year old loves it
customer_reviews.text: Comes with the stars and everything you need ...Very easy to assemble just wish they labeled the frames with letters or numbers and if you do not plan on dissembling for a while glue vertical sides at the joints..other then that my 3 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: vic

customer_reviews.title: 3-4 year old LOVES it !!
customer_reviews.text: I made this purchase several months ago and waited to see how it held up. Everything is still intact, nothing broken and the lights all still work. My daughter loves it and still plays inside. The only minor negative is that it does have a fairly large footprint, 5x5 approx., so it leaves little space left in her bedroom so we have moved it to the dining room, but wish it could be more easily disassembled or folded for temporary storage.
customer_reviews.author: PatrickBell

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: As long as you make sure you're connecting the fabric of the tent to the white poles during assembly, setting up the tent is a breeze. Easy set up and take down. Bright pink color that my daughter loves. The tent is big enough for my six-year-old and my five-year-old to play, and can tightly accommodate my company on occasion. Definitely recommend buying this product. Great quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Danny R.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but flimsy. Kids like it anyway.
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions are very poor. Structure parts are quite flimsy and the top fabric size is a little shorter than it should be to get that cute little scalloped look in the photos. Although my granddaughters were happy, I am not.
customer_reviews.author: Connie12

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this tent!! She can put all her toys inside, including the dog. If you have a little girls, definitely recommend this product. She will spend hours in there. Size is big enough, but won’t take up all your living room. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alejandra Morales

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tent.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this tent. All three of them fit inside & they love to sleep in it. The tent can be plugged in to the wall it operated on batteries. The lights also have three functions... off, blinking, or on. I recommend being sure to keep the poles together when assembling cause if you mix even one pole up you have to take the entire thing apart & start over.
customer_reviews.author: Arriesofficial

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely horrible product. Directions are for a different tent so you basically have to guess how to put it together. Once I FINALLY got it up the right way kids were able to take it apart in 2 minutes. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.author: sfcool

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little princess...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter smiled so big, which warmed my heart. Perfect for her to lounge around and big enough for even I or her dad to go in with her. The only thing is the light cords, was a mess and took my husband making it so that she couldnt take down and also not as sturdy. But this is a 5 star in my book.
customer_reviews.author: shaniya

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: It's absolutely adorable, my daughters love it. And the fact that it comes with the star lights is amazing. The only issue I had was the instructions aren't extremely clear. I was able to put it together within 20 minutes, But had to take pieces apart to be able to fit it into the tent But I probably should have just looked it over a little bit better before assembling. It's slightly cheaply made but I think it'll be perfect for my 2-year-old!!
customer_reviews.author: crystal weber

customer_reviews.title: My kids really loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My girls really love this tent. Perfect size for 4-7 years old kids. Fast shipping it arrived the next day, comes with the lights. If you plan your kids to sleep in the tent put some comforter, thick blanket or rug in the bottom. :)
customer_reviews.author: i tayag

customer_reviews.title: Nice gift, Good quality, No directions
customer_reviews.text: No directions on assembly but quality is very nice and my princess granddaughter loves it! Lights have no clips but can drape over. Decided to drape them over the curtains since they fall off the tent if their is much activity.
customer_reviews.author: Donni M

customer_reviews.title: Instructions are terrible.
customer_reviews.text: It is very cute after putting together. However the instructions are terrible and none of the pieces are labeled. It took over and hour to assemble with two people. It is large and my daughter does love it and it fits all of her toys inside I just wish the instructions were a little more clear or pieces were labeled.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: its good quality but hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a ton of these tents before ordering because there are so many similar ones on Amazon for a range of prices. We were really happy with the quality of the materials and how nice it looks put together- but it was a B**$h to put together. And it is very big, takes up a lot of space so think about how big your child's room is before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Cute but assembly was a bit annoying
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s nice. My daughter loves it however it was not easy to put together and there wasn’t any directions and every time we bump into it I’m afraid it’s gonna break but it hasn’t so overall it’s a good tent for the price
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Magical Princess Tent
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute tent, the lights really make it magical! It was easy enough to assemble and made well to stand up to toddler use. I also like how open it is compared to others, adults can comfortably fit to play with them.
customer_reviews.author: Candice Williams

customer_reviews.title: Neither great nor terrible...
customer_reviews.text: Mixed review. The tent is beautiful after a few attempts at getting the lights on. That was very frustrating. The instructions could be a lot more instructive or demonstrative. I was expecting tent poles but this tent comes with plastic tubes that connect with plastic fittings and they will brake in no time. It's big and spacious. My daughter loves it and it did turn out really pretty BUT it could be a little cheaper or come with better poles.
customer_reviews.author: L.C

customer_reviews.title: NOT WORTH IT. WARNING.
customer_reviews.text: This product is just horrible. Please do yourself a favor and look elsewhere. The light stars are made of very cheap plastic it breaks as easy as a potato chip like no lie. It was hard to assemble and the wiring for the batteries doesnt even work at all. What a waste of money. Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.author: Angoo

customer_reviews.title: Great! Our daughters love it!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 5 year old daughter. Her and our 10 year old daughter can fit in it together. Definitely was surprised by how big it is. The lights were a very nice touch too! Definitely recommend for the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent. Got it as a gift for my girls for their birthdays. They love it. The instructions could be a bit confusing. I assembled based on the photo. It was pretty easy I put it together in 15 minutes. It's fairly big as well! It takes up a good amount of their room.
customer_reviews.author: Asi Afuhaamango

customer_reviews.title: Pipes dont stay up or in place no where for the lights to go Its a mess dont bother you'll regret it
customer_reviews.text: Piece of trash and here's why, won't stay up the cheap plastic pipes don't stay in place they come off easily. Instructions some what understandable and it's just not worth your hard earned money
customer_reviews.author: Maryhelen Valdez

customer_reviews.title: So adorable and cozy!
customer_reviews.text: Great tent for the money! First tip...put it together in the room where you want it to stay, it will not fit through door frames when fully constructed. It is so adorable and can’t wait until my daughter sees it! One of the connectors did crack during assembly, but it’s a $30 kids toys...I’ll wrap some duct tape on it and be good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: 👿👿👿👿👿👿👿👿👿👿👿
customer_reviews.text: This thing must have been made by slave workers in China! We've tried everything to put this darn thing together. Nothing works. The instructions are a joke. even the length of the poles are in centimeters.
customer_reviews.author: CONSERVATIVE

customer_reviews.title: Could use better instructions
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE instructions. Not even worth it. Very confusing trying to tell the difference between the poles having to take it apart and redo it multiple times because the instructions are just pictures. HORRIBLE informative pictures. But it is pretty big and worth it if you are good at putting things together.
customer_reviews.author: April cantu

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughters 6 and 8 yrs old. They love it. It's easy to assemble if you follow the directions which I didnt at first. Very pretty which there were hooks for the lights but otherwise it's very cute and my girls love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlover

customer_reviews.title: Help on YouTube
customer_reviews.text: Very hard to assemble. YouTube has multiple video on how to get it put together. Once together looks so cute
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 tear old god daughter loved this! Her mom put it together and said the instructions weren't the easiest to understand, but it got out together regardless. Made my favourite kid happy though!!! And that's worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cacia

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Super cute gift, good size. My little 3 yr old niece was able to stand up inside the tent with no problem. My kids who are 10 and 8 have plenty of room to be in there sitting and playing, comes to tell you how big this tent is. The lighting is a nice gesture. Since this was a gift I’m not sure how the assembly went but so far my niece loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Fran M

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Kind of wobbly but hasnt fallen down and my daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy D.

customer_reviews.title: You little one will be tickled pink
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 3 year old daughter because she was dying for a tent and this just sent her over the moon. It is pretty big, she is almost 4 ( in June and she cane fully stand up in it. The only pain was putting it together because the instructions are not very clear, but it doesn’t take a rocket scientist to figure it out! All in all my baby girl is happy which makes me very happy; so......win/win!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful my daughter loves it, but i do wish it was more sturdy. It is very flimsy. Already have a broken pole less than 24 hours in. However, my daughter still absolutely loves it. The lights are also a nightmare to get apart.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: Pain in the ass to put it up bc mine was wrapped in a ball n tangled. The lights took 3 days to Un tangle. Poles r cheap n one broke the next day. But my daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Vanderpool

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter absolutely loves this, it’s so beautiful and we love the big star lights, it was a little hard to put together because the instructions was not helpful at all but besides that we are very happy with this tent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette45

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old. She absolutely loves it! She can stand up in it and has enough room to keep some toy containers and still play in it. It’s a good size tent, doesn’t tilt or fall over, worth the money. The lights are also a cute addition.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Solid and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If it wasn’t for the lights I would give it 5 stars. They are easily tangled and cannot be salvaged at this point, so I’ll have to cut them off. Other than that it’s a fun little tent.
customer_reviews.author: karried

customer_reviews.title: Wrong parts
customer_reviews.text: My C and A pieces are the same size! C is supposed to be longer but it’s not. My daughter is in tears because she really wanted to play in it but can’t even put it together with the wrong parts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT. NOT STURDY.  BUT STILL LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: A little hard to put together. Thank God I put up a camping tent before or else I would have had a lot of problems. My little girls are very active, so knocking it down won’t take long. Had to reinforce with a throw over blanket at the bottom. And tied the poles together. Overall, it’s cute. Fashionable. And the girls LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Pieter Wesley Whittington

customer_reviews.title: Only gave it one star so I could write a review
customer_reviews.text: What a terrible product! I was so excited to get this for my daughter’s Santa gift and was NOT happy to discover at 1:30 in the morning that it was made wrong (missing holes for the poles) and ripped at the bottom! NOT HAPPY!
customer_reviews.author: alisha

customer_reviews.title: Cute but cheap.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered in July now its september and the bulbs burned. Literally burned and now the lights don't work. Very flimsy. But i didnt mind that too much it was cute but now im bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Tent!
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it. She is so happy with it and it's bigger than I expected. She's a tiny 8 year old and she fits great. She has ample space said plays in it everyday. Totally recommend buying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenializ

customer_reviews.title: Best gift I ever got!
customer_reviews.text: Exact same tent in green, my niece loves it and they offer a warranty which I could not find on any other seller. Def worth it and my niece absolutely adores it. She plays in there all the time but also unwinds in there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Martinez

customer_reviews.title: lovely!
customer_reviews.text: better than the teepee tents by far! Our daughter loves it! Highly recommended buying the recommended stars instead of using the ones that come with the tent.
customer_reviews.author: Kjones

customer_reviews.title: Looks pretty, but the parts don't fit.
customer_reviews.text: How is anything supposed to fit together when it is assumed based on the directions that you have three different sized pole lengths, but you actually have eight. Nothing matches what it is supposed to in this.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Missing tube parts
customer_reviews.text: It looked like I received a used one because everything was in ziplock bags and with no instructions. As well as missing tubes and some cracks on tubes and stain scratches on the fabric. Afterwards we ended replacing a bottom tube and putting it where the missing tube was suppose to be at in the top and overall it came out nice and my girls love it. The lights were a bit low not too bright but it came out pretty and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Milli

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price but not to move around
customer_reviews.text: Good overall design. Lots of pieces so once it is assembled it is difficult to move or take down and reassemble without taking some time. Only real downfall. Lights are a plus. Overall a great addition to a playroom or girls space. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love it!!! It is so pretty with the lights. They have 2 lighting settings. The directions weren't helpful as others mentioned but the pictures on the directions were helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Juju

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for a 3 year old- everyone loved it! Big enough for 3-4 kids to play in at once, even adults can fit inside.
customer_reviews.author: KitKat55

customer_reviews.title: Fun for three kiddos!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something for three kids age 3 and 5, and this tent can accommodate all of them playing in it. Not the most spacious, more cozy. To put it together the front side has most of the details and the back gives an outline of the poles - there are three sizes and are detailed in color.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful little play tent, and just as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is adorable. Our daughter lives it and has turned it into a stuffy castle. Instructions were comically "lost in translation", but the assembly adventures were well worth the joy.
customer_reviews.author: Chef Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Great play space!
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my daughter just so she can have a fun little space to play and play with tablet and stuff before bedtime and I really loved the results over all. So this thing is pretty spacious! It’s a lot bigger than I expected it to be from looking at the ads photos which good because it does give her room to play, the only down fall is that it’s a little flimsy it’s like plastic rods holding the thing up but it’s over all super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Adel A

customer_reviews.title: low quality
customer_reviews.text: Upon setup the lights broke and we lost half of them for good. The directions are nonsensical and clearly weren't written by someone who knows English, unfortunately. It's really adorable, but it's poor quality. It'll be fine for a while.....wish there was a way to get a replacement since it broke so easily, but I don't want to pay for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble . Good quality. Cute pink castle
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to assemble although we all kmow team work is better. If your princess can't wait to rule in her castle. love the lights needs 3 AA battery not include. Ruberbands that separated rods was melted no problem just cleaned with soapy water.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Common sense required for assembly.
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect little tent for my baby who loves them. Assembly was using mostly common sense since the instructions were quite useless. After assembly it’s impossible to take your child out. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Chow

customer_reviews.title: I truly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.text: My princess turned 2 and this was the best thing I could have bought. She absolutely loves it! It’s very spacious, not extremely sturdy however as long as you not rough housing you won’t have any issues!
customer_reviews.author: Hard working mom, not alot of time!

customer_reviews.title: It’s an okay tent
customer_reviews.text: It was a pain to assemble. They lights were tangled and took me about 30 minutes to untangle. Definitely should’ve been cheaper. My daughter loved it though so I guess that’s what matters
customer_reviews.author: Kahla

customer_reviews.title: Best tent!
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my granddaughter's 3rd birthday. My son in law placed her mattress inside with little starry lights above...bit hit! she loves going to sleep inside.
customer_reviews.author: PR

product_meta.title: Sunnyglade 55'' x 53'' Princess Tent with 8.2 Feet Big and Large Star Lights Girls Large Playhouse Kids Castle Play Tent for Children Indoor and Outdoor Games
feature_bullets: ♥NEWFANGLED CASTLE DESIGN: Inspired by castles in fairy tale, this beautiful and remarkable princess house can help your little princess dreams come true. Which kid does not like a little secret place?

♥SPECIAL GIFT: This is the cutest fairy house tent, providing a private space for your kids to entertain themselves, read and relax. Screens around the playhouse keep away mosquitoes from your kids. This sizable tent can accommodate up to 3 kids at the same time. What an amazing present! Add to cart and take it home now!
♥DIMENSIONS: 55 x 53 inches. Made from high quality polyester taffeta which is also quite comfortable, durable, and easy to clean.
♥APPLICATION: Ideal for both indoor and outdoor sites such as home, kindergarten, backyard, parks and so on.
♥WHAT DO YOU GET? 1 x Princess Tent, 1 x Instructions, 48 x Poles, 37 x Connectors, 1 x Star Lights. Please note that there is large star light but no little star light.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars1,751 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
